Name: spellTileColor
Desc:
Change tile color for spellcard danmaku fields.
Input 3 comma-separated real numbers 
to control the R,G,B values of the displayed color.
For example, inputting 255,165,0 will display 
orange tiles.

Inputs with an invalid format will fallback
to the default color.
Input "default" to display the default color


Regenerate the spellcard danmaku field
to view the color change
